# Some preprocessing
```{r}
alphaOnly <- function(x) gsub("[^[:alnum:] ]", "", x)

clean<-function(col){
  return(trim(tolower(alphaOnly(unlist(strsplit(col, split=","))))))
}


```


table(raw_poll$How.long.have.you.been.using.R.)
